query: SELECT n.clienteId, c.razaoSocial, COUNT(*) as totalNotas FROM notas n INNER JOIN clientes c ON n.clienteId = c.id WHERE n.contabilidadeId = 2 AND n.status = 'valida' AND DATE_FORMAT(`notas`.`dataEmissao`, '%Y-%m') = '2026-02' GROUP BY n.clienteId, c.razaoSocial ORDER BY totalNotas DESC LIMIT 3;
